column1: techniques for providing advice on personal style include receiving advice field data and a demonstration message. the advice field data indicates multiple fields to be filled by an advisor to provide information on how to improve personal style of an advisee based on an image provided by the advisee. the demonstration message includes first image data that indicates example personal style of a first user. an advice prompt message is sent to a different second user. the advice prompt message includes second image data based on the first image data, and the advice field data.
